forum.name: How Does Mathematical Practice 3 Support Understanding and Fluency?
forum.intro:
In Session 5.1, you worked with area and perimeter together, and you had opportunities to construct arguments and critique the reasoning of others.

  • Read Area, Perimeter, and Justification.
  • Share your thoughts in the discussion forum below. Click ADD DISCUSSION TOPIC to add a post in the forum. Respond to the following:
    • How does the structure of the activity provide an opportunity for students to make viable arguments and critique the reasoning of others?
    • How might you adapt this activity for use with your own students? Share 1–2 ideas.
  • Read others’ postings and respond to two participants. (Click “Discuss this topic” on an individual post, then click “Reply” to respond to that post.)
